promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi cute simple serpent dark-type pokemon with purple cosmic scales. It can be found in castle-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, dark or serpent. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Cosmikia, a a chibi cute simple serpent dark-type pokemon. It can be found in castle-like environments It has the following abilities: Gentle Bite, Chomp. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "serpent", "dark" or "Cosmikia". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of dark-type pokemon, serpent-like, simple, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, dreamy background
generatedDescription: Residing in grand castles, this charming nebula-inspired creature uses its Gentle Bite and Chomp abilities to nibble on stony walls.
